name: Riverland
description:
You have the opportunity to play a rogue-like game in which the hero is to eliminate the targets on the map, marked with an exclamation mark. The player takes the role of a knight and traverses the map, wreaking havoc. It destroys and kills not only for its own fun, but also to protect the world from laziness that has overwhelmed the world.

EVERY GAMEPLAY IS DIFFERENT:

EVERY GAMEPLAY HAS A DIFFERENT MAP - before each game a world is created from several puzzles at random. Thanks to this, playing several times in a row, we'll probably get different maps,

EVERY GAMEPLAY HAS DIFFERENT QUESTS - randomly generated quests to destroy or kill NPCs

SO:

  • Fight,
  • Be careful that you will never end your life,
  • Be careful of massed NPCs attacks - after attacking a npc, the npc follows you, attacking you,
  • AND ABOVE ALL, PLAY FUN
